page.title: 11THE ORCHARDS
page.content: THE ORCHARDS IS SITUATED ON SANDBROOK ROAD AND WAS BUILT IN 1960. THERE ARE 56 RESIDENTS IN ALL, THE ELDEST BEING 94 AND THE YOUNGEST 62. MOST OF THE RESIDENTS ARE HOUSE_BOUND.THERE ARE 5 FULL TIME AND FOUR PART TIME STAFF. THERE ARE ALSO 2 NIGHT WARDENS. MOST OF THE OLD PEOPLE GO TO BED FROM 8.30 PM ONWARDS. SOME PEOPLE HAVE SINGLE ROOMS AND OTHERS SHARE. THERE ARE 51 BEDROOMS AND 2 LOUGES WITH A TELEVISION IN EACH. A CATHOLIC PRIEST COMES EVERY TUESDAY TO GIVE THE ELDERLY A SHORT SERVICE BECAUSE MOST OF THE RESIDENTS CANNOT GO TO CHURCH.
